Class GmmlArc

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--GmmlArc
public class GmmlArc
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the arcs. It contains a constructor, and the methods contains, setLocation and getHelpers

Constructor Summary
GmmlArc(double x, double y, double width, double height, java.lang.String color, double rotation)
          Constructor GmmlArc has 4 doubles for the coordinates and a string for the color as input.
 
Method Summary
 boolean contains(double pointx, double pointy)
          Method contains uses the coordinates of a specific point (pointx, pointy) to determine whether an arc contains this point.
 java.awt.Rectangle[] getHelpers(double zf)
          Method getHelpers returns an array of rectangles on the arc, which are used to drag and transform the arc.
 void setLocation(double x, double y)
          Method setLocation changes the double x and y coordinate to the x and y that are arguments for this method
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

GmmlArc

public GmmlArc(double x,
               double y,
               double width,
               double height,
               java.lang.String color,
               double rotation)
Constructor GmmlArc has 4 doubles for the coordinates and a string for the color as input. This input is assigned to the object arc, but no real arc is constructed.

Method Detail

contains

public boolean contains(double pointx,
                        double pointy)
Method contains uses the coordinates of a specific point (pointx, pointy) to determine whether an arc contains this point. To do this, a 'real' arc object is formed, on which the normal contains method is used.

setLocation

public void setLocation(double x,
                        double y)
Method setLocation changes the double x and y coordinate to the x and y that are arguments for this method

getHelpers

public java.awt.Rectangle[] getHelpers(double zf)
Method getHelpers returns an array of rectangles on the arc, which are used to drag and transform the arc. TO DO: the rotation should be implemented correctly with a rotation matrix, but to do that, other methods that use the helpers should be changed too. (For example the size of the arc should be calculated correctly)
